text: locals described it as beginning with a
powerful explosion before ash and smoke
shot from the top of Mount Erebus DK it
traveled five kilometres into the air
massive plumes of ash billowing from the

living near the 2000 meter volcano were
quick to evacuate many traveled through

by authorities because of what happened
at the volcano in San Miguel the
National Civil Protection system entered
into a state of alert at a national
level the choppers decay volcano is 50
kilometres from the city of San Miguel
and is one of around 20 volcanoes
throughout our Salvador
it sits on the much larger Pacific Ring
of Fire a 40,000 kilometre ring that
borders the volatile Pacific tectonic
plate it's an area that's home to 75% of
the world's volcanoes the government
says so far two people have been treated
for respiratory problems it's been
monitoring the peak since increased
activity was detected in mid-december
